poem:
Title: The Postman's Dilemma

A Czech predator stalks
the realm of letters -
Regulators asleep in the watchtower,
our Royal Mail sips vulnerability.

Redwheel pleas like a widow's lament,
water down obligations, unshackle the burden.
The courier solemnly treads,
under the weight of IDS,
while corporates play their game
on chessboard of paper and ink.
